reviews.review_text:
This is a nice pocket friendly restaurant on the way to Margo from karwar(concollium) menu offers multi cuisine and Goan food, goan fish thali and special fish thali you must try.

Liquor is available for an affordable price,

The restaurant is located very close to the state high way, car parking available for 6 to 8 cars and two Wheeler for 10 to 12 Bikes.
They have an AC dining hall and a party hall. The kitchen is  hygienic and has proper toilets.
Service is good and staff are well mannered and approachable with good behaviour.

I have tried their king fish curry and rice was good, special thali was better and fish finger was excellent.

Clean, well maintained restaurant. Multi-cusine. Service is fast and good. Located on Margao to Mangalore/ Karwar highway.

This is one of the best bars and restaurants on NH17 between Margao and Karwar. Located in a place called Demani in Cuncolim right beside the highway. Non Veg food is the speciality of the restaurant. If you are coming from Margao its around 1 km from the Cuncolim market on the left hand side. And if you are coming from Canacona it's after Cuncolim Police Station on RHS.

Excellent place, super menu, quick service, and great prices. I'm happy to have stumbled into this place, and can‚Äôt recommend it enough. Go for it üëçüèºüëçüèº

The staff and the hotel operator are co-operative. This pure veg restaurant is a delightful find, offering a culinary experience that's both satisfying and memorable. We tried the Triple Rice, Chowmin soup, Veg noodles, Masala Papad were equally impressive, providing a refreshing alternative to the usual boring roti. The staff and hotel operator were incredibly cooperative, adding to the pleasant dining atmosphere. If you're looking for delicious vegetarian food with excellent service, this restaurant is a top-notch choice. Highly recommended! üåü
